characterDescription:
The name of Lopen's mother isn't currently known. At some point during the War of Reckoning, she and her family moved to Little Herdaz, a section of Highprince Sebarial's warcamp on the Shattered Plains. She now lives with her son in Urithiru, along with many of the inhabitants of the former warcamps.
When a wounded former King Elhokar was recovering in her home in Little Herdaz, she forced the king to eat despite his objections. She said he looked pale, and did not want him found if he'd not been properly fed.

characterDetails.Personality:
She encouraged Lopen's self-deprecating jokes back when he was still missing his left arm, telling him to laugh before others could laugh at him.
She speaks the Alethi language with a thick accent, and can be extremely forceful in personality.
characterDetails.Character: She appears to have some influence amongst her relatives. Upon her urging, Punio decided to join Bridge Four.
